title: Introduction to myPackage
text: example vignette myPackage package, example package created part tutorial making R packages. practice package contains couple functions. One , random_movie_recommendation, utilizes ggplot2movies package CRAN, provides dataset movies. function, calculate_group_mean, uses example data included myPackage.

title: Introduction to myPackage
text: example_data dataset included package contains small sample data demonstration purposes. three columns: ID, Age, Likes_Coffee. can load view dataset:
code: # Load the example dataset data(example_data, package = "myPackage")  # View the dataset example_data #>   ID Age Likes_Coffee #> 1 01  25         TRUE #> 2 02  30        FALSE #> 3 03  35         TRUE #> 4 04  40         TRUE #> 5 05  45        FALSE

text: calculate_group_mean function calculates mean numeric variable rows specified binary variable TRUE. example dataset, can used find mean age people like coffee. can use calculate_group_mean function:

title: Calculate Group Mean — calculate_group_mean
text: function calculates mean numeric variable rows another variable value TRUE.

title: Calculate Group Mean — calculate_group_mean
text: df data frame containing data. numeric_var string representing name numeric variable. factor_var string representing name factor (binary) variable.

title: Calculate Group Mean — calculate_group_mean
text: numeric value representing mean specified numeric variable filtered rows.

title: Example Data — example_data
text: data frame 5 rows 3 variables: ID character vector representing ID observation. Age numeric vector representing age observation. Likes_Coffee factor vector indicating whether observation likes coffee (TRUE) (FALSE).

title: Example Data — example_data
code: example_data #>   ID Age Likes_Coffee #> 1 01  25         TRUE #> 2 02  30        FALSE #> 3 03  35         TRUE #> 4 04  40         TRUE #> 5 05  45        FALSE

title: Random Movie Recommendation — random_movie_recommendation
text: character string representing title randomly selected movie.
